subject: Alpine Skiing
Cross-Country Skiing
Figure Skating
Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild led Austria to a one-two finish in the women’s slalom at the world championships, living up to expectations by winning her first major title.
snippet: Marlies Schild led Austria to a one-two finish in the women’s slalom at the world championships, living up to expectations by winning her first major title.
